message: I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic about the time value of money. This offer won't last.
You should consider time is running out for you
Time is running out for both of us. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical option now.
Your loss is my gain, literally
This is my final compromise. Take it or leave it - we both lose out if this goes on.
I'm not budging, you're the one losing value
